    2322   * Please use Piazza properly.  It's a place for students to exchange ideas.  Don't post "easy" or "random" questions without much thinking.
    24    * To encourage students to actively participate in Piazza discussions and provide high-quality answers, we will select two students with the best Piazza performance. Each student will get 2% extra credits in the overall scores.

    5451Time: April 28, Thursday, in class. Closed books, closed notes.
    5552
    56 Here is a [attachment:CS122aMidtermS14.pdf sample midterm] with [attachment:CS122aS14MidtermSolution.pdf​ sample solutions].  Note that topics covered in each quarter might vary.     6460=== Grading Criteria ===
    65 
    6661Homework: 40% [[BR]] Quizzes: 5% [[BR]] Midterm: 25% [[BR]] Final: 29% [[BR]]  Participation in EEE Class Evaluation: 1% [[BR]]
    6762
    6863=== Homework ===
    69 Homework assignments must be turned in by the assigned due dates/times on EEE. 
     64Homework assignments must be turned in by the assigned due dates/times on EEE.
    7065
    7166 * The official due date for each assignment is listed here on the wiki, and it is expected that students will turn the work in on or before that date.
    … …  
    7469
    7570=== Discussion Sessions ===
    76 
    7771There will also be short weekly quizzes in the discussion session to give you further practice with the course material. Those will count very little towards your final grade. They are mostly a discussion session participation score, and they're really just there for your benefit to give you another opportunity to check your understanding of things.  You will get the full credit for each discussion session if you attend it, or 0 if you are absent.
    7872
    7973=== Grade Change Policy ===
    80 For all of the graded assignments as well as the midterm exam, if you disagree with the grading, you may discuss your concerns with the relevant staff member within '''1 week''' after they are returned. After that, all grades will be considered final.
    81 
     74For all of the graded assignments as well as the midterm exam, if you disagree with the grading, you may discuss your concerns with the relevant staff member within '''1 week''' after they are returned. After that, all grades will be considered final.

    9285== DBMS Platform ==
    93 This class will use an industrial-strength relational database management system (RDBMS) for the hands-on homework assignments, namely MySQL. [[BR]]
    94 For information on how to set up and use MySQL, please see: [attachment:"2016s-cs122a-mysql-installation-guide-for-mac.pdf" "[MySQL Installation Guide for Mac]"], [attachment:"2016s-cs122a-mysql-installation-guide-for-windows.pdf" "[MySQL Installation Guide for Windows]"], [attachment:"sample_script.sql" "[Sample SQL Script used in the guide]"].[[BR]]
    95 For information on how to use MySQL Command-Line Tool, please see: [attachment:"2016s-cs122a-mysql-cmdtool-guide-for-mac.pdf" "[MySQL Command-Line Tool Guide for Mac]"], [attachment:"2016s-cs122a-mysql-cmdtool-guide-for-windows.pdf" "[MySQL Command-Line Tool Guide for Windows]"] [attachment:"createscript.sql" "[Sample SQL Script used in the guide]"].[[BR]]
    96 For further information on how to use the DBMS, please go here: [https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/index.html].[[BR]]
     86This class will use an industrial-strength relational database management system (RDBMS) for the hands-on homework assignments, namely MySQL.
